Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Akamas is the autonomous optimization platform that maximizes application performance, service reliability, and cloud cost savings.  Akamas helps performance engineers, developers, DevOps, platform engineers, and SREs be more productive, prevent incidents, and achieve aggressive optimization goals at enterprise scale.  Unlike infrastructure-focused cloud optimization tools, Akamas is application-aware, meaning that it optimizes full-stack configurations, taking into account application performance and reliability signals, SLOs, and user-defined constraints.  With support for both continuous optimization of live applications in production environments, and automated performance tuning of applications in test/pre-production, Akamas uses reinforcement learning AI, observability data, and safety constraints to autonomously identify and apply the best system configurations to achieve cost, performance, and reliability goals.  Founded by veterans in performance engineering, Akamas counts AWS, Dynatrace, Google Cloud, Gremlin, Mia-Platform, Micro Focus, RedHat, Tricentis, and Splunk among its technology partners. Akamas customers include leading financial services, SaaS software, and online consumer services brands.

Starting from highly regulated industries such as Finance and Insurance, Aptus.AI has developed and patented proprietary machine-readable technology that automates regulatory monitoring and change management, reports draft generation, impact and risk analysis, establishing itself as a leader in financial compliance. Synthetic data allows us to responsibly seize the wealth of opportunities AI presents. This is invaluable in sectors such as healthcare, finance, infrastructure, and policymaking. Description: Harnessing AI and blockchain to empower individuals in sustainability. A global environmental action platform, recognized by the UN and EU.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: AWorld is a leading SaaS platform committed to fostering sustainability and environmental consciousness among individuals and organizations. With a foundation built on cutting-edge technologies like AI, blockchain, and data analytics, AWorld offers a unique ecosystem designed to measure, incentivize, and educate users about their carbon footprint and the impact of their daily choices on the environment. The platform provides a dynamic and interactive experience through its AWorld ActNow app and API integration capabilities, enabling seamless incorporation into third-party applications, intranets, and systems. This versatile approach allows AWorld to engage a wide range of users, including employees, students, citizens, and consumers, in meaningful sustainability efforts. AWorld's innovative Impact Engagement™ methodology combines real-time monitoring of CO2 emissions with personalized recommendations, challenges, and rewards, encouraging users to adopt more sustainable lifestyles. Through gamification and micro-learning, the platform makes sustainability accessible and actionable for everyone, supporting organizations in their ESG and NetZero goals. Trusted by prestigious entities like the United Nations and the European Commission, AWorld has been recognized as the Best App for Good in 2023. Its client roster includes renowned global corporations, cities, universities, and event organizers, demonstrating the platform's scalability and effectiveness in driving change. Whether through its standalone app or integrated solutions, AWorld is dedicated to transforming environmental awareness into action, making it easier for individuals and organizations to contribute to a healthier planet. With a strong commitment to privacy, security, and user engagement, AWorld continues to innovate, providing tools and insights that empower users to make a real difference.
Industry Groups: Apps, Education, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Software, Sustainability

Full Description: Equixely aims to help developers and organizations create more secure applications, increase their security posture, and spread knowledge of new vulnerabilities. Equixely makes available a SAAS platform that allows integrating the API security testing within the software development lifecycle (SLDC) to detect flaws, reduce bug-fixing costs and exponentially scale penetration testing upon every new functionality released. The platform can automatically perform several API attacks leveraging a novel machine learning (ML) algorithm trained over thousands of security tests. Then, Equixely returns near-real-time results and a predictive remediation plan that developers may use to fix their application issues autonomously. The Equixely advanced platform and its innovative security testing approach take an organization's API security maturity to the next level.

Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: EnerClock is at the forefront of the energy management revolution, providing cutting-edge digital solutions that empower users to optimize their energy usage and contribute to a sustainable future. EnerClock is a central component of this vision, offering a customizable interface that integrates seamlessly with various energy assets, including solar panels, EV chargers, and smart meters. Designed for flexibility and convenience, EnerClock allows users to monitor and control their energy consumption in real time. By providing insights into energy flows, costs, and emission reductions, the platform enables users to make informed decisions to enhance energy efficiency and reduce operational costs. EnerClock also features advanced functionalities such as load prioritization and remote diagnostics, ensuring that users can maintain optimal energy management without the help of onsite technicians. EnerClock’s platform is built on the XENON framework, which connects distributed energy resources into a cohesive system. This integration supports various use cases, from home energy management to large-scale virtual power plants, making EnerClock a versatile solution for both residential and commercial users. The platform is fully customizable, allowing businesses to incorporate their branding and tailor the interface to their specific needs. With robust security features, including two-factor authentication and over-the-air updates, EnerClock ensures that user data is protected while maintaining the latest software capabilities. The company’s commitment to innovation and sustainability makes EnerClock a leader in the energy management sector, driving the transition to a decentralized and sustainable future.

Description: Virtual thermal sensing made easy
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: We’ve built a cutting-edge software engineering platform that enables the creation of real-time embedded virtual sensors for model predictive control and diagnostics of electromechanical systems—unlocking new levels of performance, reliability, and lifespan. At the heart of our solution is a highly accurate digital twin that mirrors the electrodynamic and thermodynamic behavior of physical devices like electric motors and generators across a full spectrum of operating conditions. What sets us apart is our proprietary mathematical framework that slashes computational complexity by orders of magnitude. This allows our ultra-efficient digital models to run directly on-device—in real time—delivering lightning-fast, chip-level firmware performance. By continuously estimating key parameters such as internal temperature thousands of times per second, our Virtual Sensing technology delivers deep, real-time system insight. The result? Smarter control strategies, improved performance, and a foundation for transformative capabilities like predictive maintenance, aging diagnostics, and anomaly detection, all from within the machine itself.
Industry Groups: Manufacturing, Science and Engineering, Software, Transportation
Top 5 Investors: Plug and Play, CDP Venture Capital, 360 Capital, Vertis, Join Capital

Full Description: Buzzoole is an influencer marketing platform. It allows brands to integrate key influencers into their digital and social communications in a fully automated, transparent, and ROI-driven approach. Our technology analyses the online conversations of all registered users across each of their social media channels. Through a semantic model, Buzzoole is able to categorize conversations and to identify the topics that users are most influential in, according to its own algorithm. This allows brands to reach out to specific influencers in their niche market in a completely automated way. Buzzoole's business model is a CPP mode. Brands pay on the basis of posts generated by the influencers. This Cost-Per-Post model allows us to offer all sizes of solutions. From startups to top brands. Working with Buzzoole can save companies up to 70% compared with cooperating with external agencies, which is usually a lengthier, more complicated, and more expensive process. Buzzoole's proprietary algorithm solves the analysis and matching problem, and the transparent approach to campaigns means brands will always see how much they are spending, who is working on their campaign, and what their campaign ROI is.

Industries: Analytics, Big Data, Business Intelligence, Food Processing, Generative AI, Internet of Things, Recycling, Renewable Energy, Robotics, Waste Management
Description: The startup developing software and AI-powered robots sas to revolutionize waste management.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Ganiga is a deep tech company that combines advanced robotics and a proprietary Generative AI platform to transform waste management into an automated, data-driven process. Our technology is designed to recognize, sort, and analyze waste in real time, while also tracking weight and environmental impact, including CO₂ emissions. We aim to solve the inefficiencies of traditional waste handling by creating intelligent, scalable solutions that help businesses and public infrastructures reduce operational costs, optimize recycling processes, and improve sustainability reporting. Ganiga’s ecosystem includes: Hoooly!Indoor: A smart bin designed for indoor spaces like airports, offices, and malls. It automatically identifies waste types and directs items to the correct compartment, while collecting live data on volumes, materials, and environmental impact. Hoooly!Small: A retrofit AI-powered cover that transforms existing bins into smart systems. Equipped with cameras and sensors, it identifies the waste before disposal and automatically opens the correct section, improving sorting accuracy without replacing existing infrastructure. Hoooly!Food: A modular system designed to monitor and reduce food waste in corporate cafeterias, restaurants, and large-scale food services. Using computer vision and precision scales, it tracks discarded food, providing insights to minimize waste and optimize purchasing. Ganiga operates through a Hardware + SaaS model, combining product sales with recurring revenue from software services that manage analytics, system updates, and predictive maintenance. Our mission is to turn waste into measurable, actionable data and become the global reference for automated sustainable waste management, enabling companies to achieve their ESG goals with traceability, transparency, and operational efficiency.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Energy, Food and Beverage, Hardware, Internet Services, Science and Engineering, Software, Sustainability

Description: ViteSicure is a fully digital insurtech broker that provides financial products with a high premium level digital customer experience.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: ViteSicure is the first insurtech that transforms the policy buying experience by making it affordable, self-service and instantaneous for the multitude of financially vulnerable people. It is the only case of life protection insurance on demand that is sustainable not only because it is completely paperless but also because it's inclusive thanks to products developed directly with RGA, a world leader in life reinsurance. It's also instant thanks open API platform that allows full digital customer onboarding through a need-based product proposition. Last but not least it is self service: in 3 minutes customers in a single process purchase and download the Policy online with the support of digital tools such as the Protection Calculator and the human touch of the excellent omni-digital customer service. viteSicure, brand of the insurance broker Bridge insurance Services is authorized to distribute insurance products in the European Economical Space and guaranteed by a Team with over 25 years of expertise in insurance, marketing and tech. Why viteSicure In Italy, 48% of families do not save, 61% suffer from anxiety about the economic future of the family and only 6% have life protection insurance. This is called Protection GAP (difference between resources needed and available at the death of the head of the family) and is a worldwide problem while companies are still focused on offering savings products, not aligned with the new buying habits of customers, with complicated and old processes, ignoring the millions of financially vulnerable customers. Customers are online, reacting to advertising and using technology and so we believed that digital transformation was the solution to engage customers, educate them about the insurance solution, reduce the distance to insurance and meet the demands and needs immediately. Technology is our enabler for reaching the financially vulnerable. Our open API platform enables fully digital processes not only with insurance companies as is the case with most digital brokers but across the entire value chain thus enabling full transformation and integration of processes. We use APIs for partner integration, for the omni-digital customer service system and even for trustpilot for example. viteSicure is therefore the only one that boasts a fully digital customer onboarding, marketing funnel and customer service that for the customer means a quick and easy journey for a unique insurance buying experience that is aligned with their buying habits. ViteSicure is backed and invested by RGAX (Reinsurance Group of America) and Reale Mutua Insurance Group

Top 5 Investors: Cassa Depositi e Prestiti, Intesa Sanpaolo, Digital Magics, RGAx, Reale Group

Description: IoT SaaS helping OEMs and service providers redesign and enrich after-sales processes by harnessing connected products data

Full Description: Servitly helps OEMs and service providers harness data from connected products to redesign and enrich their after-sales services and processes, through a Cloud-based, configurable IoT application. Through Servitly services also become "Connected". This allows organizations to reduce costs and risks of their after-sales operations, enrich their offerings with IoT-enabled solutions, establish lasting relationships with customers, generate new recurring revenue streams from subscriptions, spare parts and consumables and new service models, like Equipment-as-a-Service. The application is made up of a Connected Customer Portal, giving end customers capabilities like remote monitoring and control, troubleshooting, performance advisory, reporting, subscriptions, spare parts and consumables purchase, and a Digital Control Room, giving all the after-sales professionals capabilities like remote diagnostics, installed base monitoring and alerting, smart proactive maintenance planning, purchase orders management. The software integrates with existing IoT technologies to collect raw data from connected products, processes data to extract actionable information, triggers business processes within other information systems, like FSMs, and provides information and digital capabilities to all stakeholders in the value chain: organization, end customers, third parties. The most distinguishing feature of Servitly is the Console, a no-code environment for configuring all organization-specific application details. Through it, Servitly offers a "buy and configure" alternative to companies that are not satisfied with the "make" of resource-intensive, slow-growing, difficult-to-manage, and incomplete homegrown solutions. Established in 2019, Servitly is now trusted by more than 40 customers in Europe, operating in different industries like HVAC, Food, Water, Energy, Industrial Processing and Packaging, to deliver Connected Services bound to more than 23,000 Connected Products.
Industry Groups: Internet Services, Software

FLEEPtech developed a proprietary process for the fabrication of polymer-based integrated circuits based on Organic Thin-Film Transistors, creating the intelligent core for electronics systems that are mechanically flexible, printed like magazines and recyclable. FLEEPtech is the missing link in the printed electronics industry between a great number of flexible and printed products (i.e. sensors, actuators and energy supplies) that find little space in being integrated with standard non-flexible electronics. Industries: Cyber Security, Image Recognition, Information Technology, Software
Description: ToothPic provides solutions on technologies for the recognition of photographic devices.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: ToothPic provides solutions on technologies for the recognition of photographic devices. ToothPic’s mission is turning every smartphone into a secure and user-friendly key for user authentication. ToothPic is an official university spin-off of Politecnico di Torino, a major engineering school in Italy and Europe, and is incubated in the university incubator I3P, recently recognized by UBI Global as the best public incubator worldwide.  ToothPic was founded by a team of 4 researchers and professors from Politecnico di Torino, and in 2018 received a seed from VV3TT, an Italian Venture Capital fund dedicated to Technology Transfer from public research. ToothPic technology is protected by 4 patents, and won several prizes in competitions dedicated to startups and twice the Seal of Excellence issued by the European Commission.  ToothPic’s target is the market of authentication systems. Its technology recognizes the unique pattern of invisible imperfections that characterize smartphone cameras to protect cryptographic keys stored on devices, that are commonly used for user authentication, digital signature, blockchain related applications. The additional layer of security represented by this random unclonable feature can be obtained with no additional hardware and related costs.  A Software Development Kit has been developed for Android and iOS. It can be integrated into existing third-party apps and authentication systems, allowing the device possession verification by (de)obfuscating asymmetric cryptographic keys. Users’ credentials are not stored in a centralized service provider server - representing a single point of failure exploitable by an attacker, but they are distributed on users’ devices. Hence, an adversary willing to violate those credentials should target each single user device, facilitating for service providers the migration from an on premises architecture to the cloud, because they don’t need to manage sensitive users credentials, but only their public key.
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Privacy and Security, Software
Top 5 Investors: Club degli Investitori, Vertis Venture 3 Tech Transfer

Description: Making Blood Donations Cool
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Rosso is a startup dedicated to eliminating the blood shortage crisis in Italy by serving as a connective tissue in the blood supply chain, collaborating with schools, universities, donor associations, and hospitals. Our primary goal is to reduce patient wait times by increasing the number of donors, particularly young donors. Currently, Generation Z is not donating blood significantly; the average donor age is 45, while donation is allowed from 18 to 65 years old. Through innovative social media campaigns and a booking platform, we raise awareness among young people, encouraging them to book donations at nearby centers and providing instant chat access with hematologists to address their concerns. For companies, we offer a welfare service and sustainability membership that engages employees in health prevention and blood donation. We organize awareness webinars, donation days, and monitor employee health, providing impact reports. These activities are included in the company's sustainability report and contribute to B-Corp certification. Our third pillar involves management software for hospitals. We offer a plugin that optimizes blood stock management in hospitals by managing donor portfolios and the relationships between donors, associations, and hospitals. By knowing the blood stock levels, we can send automatic recalls or alerts when blood is needed and there are donors nearby ready to donate. With the help of AI, we can predict future blood stock needs, required blood types, and the timing of potential shortages.
Industry Groups: Health Care
Top 5 Investors: B4i - Bocconi for innovation, Moonstone, LCA Ventures, Matteo Cera, Pietro Cesati

Description: Emotiva is a deep tech artificial intelligence company specialized in measuring human's attention and affective states.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Emotiva is a deep tech artificial intelligence company specialized in measuring human's attention and affective states. It has developed computer vision and machine learning algorithms to detect and analyze micro facial movements encoded as Action Units (AUs), units of activation of a muscle or muscle groups that configure the expression of an emotion. Considering emotions a value of absolute importance, Emotiva has established the ethical-scientific committee that oversees the development of technology and ethics of artificial intelligence, taking into account the aspects related to privacy and GDPR laws. Emotiva actively collaborates with the PHuSE Lab, the Computer Science department of the University of Milan, and the top Italian Universities in computer vision and robotics fields for R&D activities. Emotiva has developed EmPower, a SaaS platform in media analytics, to analyze emotional responses and measure people's attention levels while watching content. It has made a process that used to be complex and costly, easy and fast. Today it is possible to get insights on unconscious response in just a few clicks. Thanks to EmPower, companies make more accurate decisions and avoid wasting their budget on target segments that are poorly connected emotionally or lack attention.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Hardware, Information Technology, Science and Engineering, Software
Founders: Andrea Lori, Andrea Sempi, Lorenzo Corbo

APA achieves an impressive 99% reduction in surface-level air pollution, addressing the widest range of toxic elements and harmful substances including greenhouse gasses such as CO2 and nanoparticles, several times smaller than viruses, even enabling prevention and protection of human health.  APA flexibility and low running and maintenance costs make it an ideal solution for all spaces of life and work, with several various applications in both indoor and outdoor environments, and solutions to earn carbon credits. Full Description: Enco is a 3.0 start-up with a clear mission: to give people back control over their own energy, 100% renewable of course. Enco is a fundamental step towards a zero-emission economy, more people-centred than profit-centred.  How? By creating energy communities in a simple and transparent way, equipping citizens with the tools they need to produce energy on the roof of their homes, and share it with their neighbours, without having to deal with bureaucracy. Enco's vision is a world in which everyone benefits from the economic, environmental and social advantages of an energy community, and is empowered to produce energy.  Specifically? Enco installs photovoltaic panels and storage systems, creates and manages energy communities, and distributes the proceeds fairly among the participants. With Enco you can produce renewable energy, consume it, share it with your neighbours, save on your energy bills and contribute to a greener Italy.

Description: Vento CFD srl is a computer software company.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Vento is a software and consultancy company specializing in Computational Fluid Dynamics for the Architecture, Engineering and Construction (AEC) field and built across four key applications: -	Wind Load Determination: accurate assessment of wind loads on buildings and structures -	Pedestrian Comfort: ensuring optimal comfort in open urban spaces -	Building Physics Analysis: in-depth study of heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems -	Risk Analysis: comprehensive evaluation and prevention of potential risks What sets VENTO AEC apart is its proprietary "non-conformal grid" technology, enabling seamless interaction within the Building Information Modeling (BIM) environment. Unlike traditional approaches, VENTO AEC can directly import IFC models without the need for simplification.  The result? Up to 95 percent reduction in pre-processing time and costs, coupled with tailored post-processing based on specific application domains.  Harnessing the power of CFD modeling, VENTO AEC offers a multitude of benefits, including cost savings in building materials, enhanced value in urban planning projects, support for LEED and WELL certifications, and robust risk analysis and prevention capabilities. With over 30 years of dedicated research and development, VENTO AEC aims at being the pinnacle of advanced CFD simulation in today's global landscape.

Description: Fantacycling is the first fantasy game cycling app
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Fantacycling is a user-friendly app that allows fans to create their own fantasy cycling teams and engage in exciting challenges. Users can form teams for the Championship or compete in private or public leagues, offering a variety of ways to play with friends or meet new cycling enthusiasts globally. The Championship: Users have a budget of 500 Fantamillions to assemble a team of 30 riders, featuring all UCI World Tour team riders, carefully illustrated by our designers. Each race requires a lineup of 9 riders, with the goal of scoring points as more of your riders finish in top positions. Compete against teams from all over the world and showcase your strategic skills! Private or Public Leagues: Whether you're playing with friends or meeting new people, users can create leagues with fully customizable rules. Invite as many friends as you like, or set up a public league and connect with fellow fans via geolocation. Users can also form teams through online or offline auction methods, envelopes mode, or using the quotation list provided by Fantacycling staff. Throughout the season, we host Special Events in collaboration with sponsors, tied to some of the most iconic races in the cycling world. Players can win exciting prizes and take part in thrilling challenges. We are proud of our active community, with over 125,000 registered users, more than 80,000 playing in the global championship, and over 15,000 leagues already formed. Our strong presence on social media includes an Instagram account with high engagement, a Telegram channel with over 2,500 users and 3,000 messages per day, and a YouTube channel offering race analysis with live streaming sessions that attract a large audience and nearly 3 million views. Additionally, we host a popular weekly TV show every Thursday on Bike Channel TV (available on SKY and DTT). Join the fun and challenge yourself to become the ultimate fantasy cycling manager!
Industry Groups: Apps, Gaming, Software, Sports

Description: Manet leverages its proprietary technology to bring disruptive solutions for tourism & hospitality, by focusing on driving guest engagement.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Manet Mobile Solutions is an Italian company focused on developing digital solutions for the tourism industry aimed at providing travelers around the world with Internet connectivity and a universe of content and services designed to enrich their travel experience. It operates across 10 countries with more than 200 customers, including leading hospitality, car rental, and travel brands, who enjoy Manet' solutions as tools capable of generating additional revenue, simplifying daily operations, and increasing the satisfaction and engagement of their customers. The company was founded in 2015 as the brainchild of five young entrepreneurs: Antonio Calia, Marco Barbato, Luca Liparulo, Marco Maisto and Andrea Proietti. The startup was able to raise private capital also thanks to the LVenture Group investment fund (a holding company listed on the MTA of the Italian stock exchange), to its business accelerator LUISS EnLabs (originated from a joint venture with the LUISS University) and to the related network of business angels, leading the startup to attract more than €2 million in investment over time for product and business development. Manet's initial concept relied on a fully customized smartphone designed for hotel, b&b and vacation rental guests, offering free international calls and unlimited Internet connectivity, along with the ability to book all accommodation services directly from the Manet smartphone and take advantage of a whole range of tourist content and services tailored on the destination, such as a travel guide, food and wine suggestions, utility tools (translator, currency exchange, etc.), and the ability to purchase tickets for events, museums and attractions. Starting in 2018, the Manet smartphone evolves into a digital travel assistant also aimed at the car rental industry, to equip car renters with an innovative tool to replace more traditional GPS navigators and Wi-Fi portable routers. Then, in 2020, Manet services are also being made available through the Manet App - directly installable in the travelers' smartphones - in order to offer a fully customized staying experience for hotel guests. The technological advancements in the telecommunications industry leads the company to rethink the original concept in order to develop an even more revolutionary and innovative product. In 2022, the company started rolling out Manet Travel, a connectivity solution based on eSIM (virtual SIM) technology that can bring via an app all the content and services offered on board Manet smartphones directly to the traveler's personal device. Jointly with tour operators, travel agencies, and other travel and tourism players, Manet Mobile Solutions enables travelers from around the world to enjoy a data connectivity package on their personal smartphones thanks to eSIM technology, enabling them to surf the Internet and access the universe of services and content offered by Manet and to enhance their overall abroad travel experience.
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Mobile, Software, Travel and Tourism
Founders: Alessandro Rossi, Andrea Proietti, Antonio Calia, Luca Liparulo, Marco Barbato, Marco Maisto
Top 5 Investors: Italian Angels for Growth, LVenture Group

Description: Neuron Guard is developing a medical device the new standard of care for targeted temperature management of brain damages.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Neuron Guard, recognized as the best European startup in HEALTH category (Startup Europe Awards - SEUA 2017), is developing a life-saving medical device that aims to become the standard of care for Targeted Temperature Management (TTM) therapy.  Every 7 seconds around the world a person suffers of Acute Brain Damage because of Cardiovascular Diseases (CVD) and Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI). They are the most costly and prevalent killers in the last 15 years (15 million deaths by CVD in 2015), and the leading cause of disability (the global incidence rate of TBI is 200 per 100k people per year). WHO estimated a global expenditure of $ 330 billion in 2015, but it is going to increase sharply: $ 4 trillion in 2025 - including premature death, disability, and health care costs - just for CVD in LMICs.  Temperature is a vital body parameter. It regulates all cellular functions so its management is essential for the good outcome of patients in several medical conditions such as cardiac arrest, stroke, traumatic brain injury, neuro and cardiac surgery, epilepsy, migraine and oncology. Regulating body temperature at a desired level makes all other treatments more effective. The most modern medical approach is the target temperature management, where physicians try to maintain the most favourable temperature for the patient for up to 24-36 hours, preventing excessive warming (fever) or cooling. Our device is a targeted temperature management system composed by a THERAPEUTIC COLLAR POWERED BY A SMART CONTROL UNIT (the size of a small briefcase). The collar transforms the neck into a natural heat exchanger exploiting several physiological and anatomical characteristics of the human body. It is quicker to act on brain tissue but can also function as total body temperature adjusting device if required. A disposable protective shield makes cleaning the collar after each use simple while featuring an optimal safety profile both in term of pathogens and allergens. The control unit collects all the data of the treatment and transmits them to the Emergency Response System.  Our mission is to improve the safety of patients on the roadside, at home or in the workplace, and to reduce the costs of chronic care. In fact, Neuron Guard aims to be the only device that can be used in every circumstance, inside and outside the hospital, and allow the user to fully manage the temperature of the patient warming and cooling as necessary.  Our vision is to have a Neuron Guard kit in every public place just like the Automatic External Defibrillator (AED) to empower bystanders to immediately react in case of emergency. Under this perspective our device becomes a connected-intelligent platform that takes care of the patient, connects the scene with the Emergency Response System transmitting vital data to improve the readiness and effectiveness of professional intervention. The device is patented in Italy, USA and China. We have made several prototypes in collaboration with Italian and English companies, such as Tecno Elettra Impianti and TWI, tested it in laboratory and published the experimental results on the NeuroCritical Care Journal. We have also conducted a GAP Analysis with another English consulting firm (CDP) and we are testing the human prototype internally.  We are seeking to raise 2.5M€ to complete the pre-industrialization, with design and construction of the human device for the pilot trial, finalized the regulatory clearance and launch it into the market in 2019.
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering
Top 5 Investors: CDP Venture Capital, Fondo Rilancio Startup, A11 Venture

Industries: Information Technology, Logistics, Sharing Economy, Shipping, Smart Cities, Software, Transportation
Description: SiWeGO is a mobile app that connects those who want to ship goods and those who are willing to transport them.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: SiWeGO is an App for Android, iOS and WEB that sells the empty space of vehicles with easy, safe and real-time matching saving time & money for drivers & senders.  Currently, delivering items to family, friends or strangers requires the services of a courier or of a public agency, that usually are affected by delays, loss of goods or high cost proportioned to the items delivered. Last but not least their inefficiency causes pollution, due to an extra number of vehicles on the road. SiWeGO was created to provide a more efficient service of delivery, by optimizing the resources of professionals and private transporter, i.e. companies and private citizens. Indeed we know, according to European research, that  25% of vehicles on the road, both private and corporate, travel empty. SiWeGO aims to sell these spare spaces of vehicles by connecting who is already on a vehicle and wants to transport with those who want to ship goods. With a real-time matching system, the user can find immediately someone who wants to transport his items; once the good is given to the transporter the sender can constantly track it and chat, thus having everything under control; also the payment can be immediately made online and finally there can be feedback from both sides. On the other side, the transporter is not due to organizing new transport, because he is already on the road and can be detected by the nearer sender. It is easy to understand how this system allows huge saving of time, money and air. SiWeGO works through a platform for web, Android and iOS, equipped with last generation technologies allowing a huge number of links between users: freight transport companies, private citizen-transporter, senders. This is the reason why SiWeGO is highly scalable and replicable. According to its double business model, B2B and B2C, SiWeGO targets two subjects: freight transport companies, which will be asked to buy an annual subscription, and private citizens involved in the delivery market (for example off-site students and workers and frequent E-shoppers) who can download the app for free and pay, if senders, a fee of 9% on the agreed cost of transport. SiWeGO is meant to impact globally thanks to the high scalability of the platform, nevertheless, Italy will be the focus of the first year as the first stage used to acquire users by implementing strong dissemination and marketing actions.
Industry Groups: Information Technology, Other, Real Estate, Software, Transportation
Top 5 Investors: Anonymous Trust, Messaggerie del Garda, Holdinvest, Gruppo Sinergia

Description: Pixies is a hi-tech startup that designs solutions for Autonomous Cities and a more sustainable future of our planet
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Pixies is a hi-tech startup that has developed a zero-impact system that combines Autonomous Mobile Robots, equipped with AI, and smart solar-powered benches, in which the robots are stored and re-charged. The system was created to solve the cleaning problem in urban contexts directly through the city. Indeed, the mobile robots are little autonomous sweepers, which are able to get around the surroundings whilst collecting waste and avoiding obstacles, both static and dynamic, to then dock inside the bench and be charged thanks to solar energy.  Our aim is to develop an urban space which takes advantage of IoT devices, scattered around the city, to constantly sense and respond to the environment, while collecting useful data that will improve the management of the entire urban realm.  Pixies’s strength is its bottom-up approach to the problem of cleaning within cities, which ensures a very high level of efficiency, since it is a 24/7 on site, quick and sustainable solution. Moreover, thanks to the presence of the smart benches, we will have fixed charging stations directly installed around the city, thus giving a new piece of urban furniture, useful both for the environment and for the citizens. It's important to point out that the implementation of Pixies for cleaning purposes is only the beginning. Please, bear in mind that this system can be used within cities for a thousand other applications (delivery, first aid, mobile charging for vehicles, etc.), always remaining bottom-up, efficient and sustainable because it is embedded with the urban space. The competitive advantage of Pixies is its bottom-up approach to the problem of cleaning. Indeed, Pixies integrates the robots directly into the city, through the use of smart benches as charging bases for them. So far, Pixies has installed the prototype of the robot and the smart bench in the courtyard of the mixed-use building ( residential, hotel and offices) where the company is based, here in Rome, making it active and supervised by ourselves every day.  The system works perfectly. It's able to operate up to 8 hours per day, covering an area of 2'000 sqm, both indoor (300 sqm) and outdoor (1'700 sqm).  As results, the cleaning efficiency has been increased of about 30% and the related cost has been, therefore, reduced of about 40%. Our closest competitors are : Trombia, Enway, Idriverplus, TSM. However, we can also add to these other companies that have developed solutions for the autonomous indoor cleaning. These are, for instance: Fybots,Cyberdyne, Avidbots, Adlatus and Makita.
Industry Groups: Hardware, Other, Real Estate, Science and Engineering, Software, Sustainability
Founders: Andrea Saliola, Flavio Ceccarelli, Pier Paolo Ceccaranelli
Top 5 Investors: Cassa Depositi e Prestiti, Key Capital, LVenture Group

The integrated learning assessment system offers digitally documented evidence of understanding that can be used in the event of a lawsuit. In addition to providing a paperless document flow, Confirmo is compliant with the strictest privacy regulations such as the GDPR, significantly simplifying the work of Data Protection Officers. The software can be integrated with all existing systems and is available for all customers, from single professionals to large companies. The application, designed to be easily used by anybody, already has thousands of successfully signed documents. Confirmo, thanks to the fully-aware digital platform,  revolutionizes digital signature providing greater transparency and legal protection.

Once you download the smartphone app you can start a conversation by either typing or speaking a message. The recipient will listen on their end and reply, and you will immediately read a transcription of what he or she just said. The Pedius app is especially useful when you need to contact someone accessible only by phone, and it is an excellent help when you need to be careful about your privacy.

Description: The first Italian platform that is changing the way people find, choose and adopt a pet!
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Empethy is a digital platform that aims to facilitate pet adoptions in Italy. In particular, people looking to adopt a pet can choose their own location (region/city where they are looking to adopt), apply a number of filters to find their perfect match (e.g. size, weight, gender, age, compatibility with elderly, other animals, etc.) and send the application form directly to the shelters by filling out the online form. Once the adoption request has been sent, users will be able to access their own private area where they will be able to monitor the status of their request (online form accepted/rejected, the face-to-face meeting passed/rejected, adoption accepted/rejected). In addition to this, Empethy offers a personalized online consultation service in order to provide an array of useful tips and advice aimed at "preparing" the future adopter for a conscious and responsible adoption of the future dog/ cat. On the other hand, animal shelters, rescue groups, volunteers can upload their adoption ads easily and quickly by filling out a standardized online form containing all the information needed for a conscious adoption decision (e.g. personal data, vaccinations/castrations, special needs, pathologies, etc.). Once created their own profiles, associations will be able to access their private area, where they will be able to manage all incoming requests (accept/reject the online form, accept/reject face-to-face meeting, accept/reject adoption) for each individual pet in a more standardized and automated way. Empethy's mission is to encourage responsible pet adoption in order to ensure a long-term relationship between humans and animals and prevent the abandonment of other animals. When selecting a companion animal for life, the compatibility of the personality traits, needs, and lifestyle should always be considered. Indeed, each animal has its own history and needs, which may or may not correspond to the lifestyle and needs of the future owner.
Industry Groups: Community and Lifestyle, Information Technology, Other, Social Impact, Software

Industries: Chatbot, Cloud Computing, Customer Service, Information Technology, Marketing Automation, Messaging, SaaS, Sales Automation, Social CRM, Software
Description: #1 IN THE WORLD VISUAL ENGAGEMENT TO BRINGS CHATBOT, CHAT, COLLABORATION, IDENTITY, ESIGN & PAYMENT TOGETHER INTO AN AUTOMATIC SALES FUNNEL
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: INVENTIA IS THE #1 IN THE WORLD VISUAL ENGAGEMENT TO BRINGS CHATBOT, CHAT, COLLABORATION, IDENTITY, ESIGN & PAYMENT TOGETHER INTO AN AUTOMATIC SALES FUNNEL MANAGEMENT TO GUIDE PROSPECTS FROM ENGAGEMENT TO SALES IN A CLICK.  Gartner Cool Vendor 2015 The Inventia 3.5 platform is based on WebRTC technology and allows you to manage customer engagement, collaboration, commercial script or CRM automated procedures, and even customer identification to digital signature or payment, and all these within a multichannel chat system. On the Inventia platform, customer engagement can take place in many ways, for example through the use of a chat-bot solution and an auto reply system, or through text-chat and video-chat, by providing innovative and effective support to the customer who will be constantly guided by the remote agent for any support in assistance or purchasing matters. The platform also offers extensive web-collaboration and online identification capabilities for customer on-boarding, in both attended and un-attended made, according to the required compliance, and according to the European eIDAS regulation. Inventia 3.5 can also integrate with any digital signature system and allowing a contract to be signed within the Chat system. For this reason, the Inventia platform is primarily designed to handle sales processes in addition to CRM, and allows you to manage customer engagement, identification, signatures and sale all in one package. Engage-identify-sign & sell! Inventia 3.5 exclusive feature is the ability to guide the customer through commercial and CRM scripts/processes step by step within a chat system, by automating agent activities, and speeding up script execution and customer satisfaction. In some cases, the benefits gained were, in terms of operator efficiency increase, even 65% compared to similar solutions. The solution allows you to manage customer engagement through a synergic chatbot-text chat and videochat (one-2-one or one-2-many) system allowing the operator to interact with multiple customers (max 10 contemporaries per agent) by upgrading the interaction from a text chat to a video chat to guide the customer. It is the only solution on the market offering the capability of customer experience within a commercial or sales script in a fully automated way, also managing customer identification and integration with signature systems. In summary, the operator - Expert - can guide the customer - Consumer - into each script on any Inventia supported channel. The solution is specifically designed for the Enterprise market and offers security, scalability, interoperability and reliability levels at the highest standards of the market.

Description: WHIP is a tech company focused on the mass-market that develops software products to measure, support and improve outdoor sports performance
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: WHIP is a tech company that provides software products to measure and supports over 20 outdoor sports disciplines (i.e. cycling, mountain biking, motorcycling, running, hiking, climbing, skiing, ecc.), both at elite and amateur/mass-market levels. WHIP developed and patented a data fusion algorithm that can gather metrics for outdoor and action sports using the data points retrieved from consumers’ device sensors, such as mobile phones and action cameras. The technology enables consumers’ devices to track at high-frequency. In fact, the metrics gathered through this technology are 4 to 20 times more precise than, for instance, the ones of mobile apps that track performance. The flagship product of WHIP is WHIP LIVE, the mobile app that stands as a global community for runners, cyclists and motorcyclists who use WHIP’s technology to support, improve and connect their everyday sports experience. In 2018 WHIP LIVE was launched on the Apple App Store and Android Play Store. In 2020, after consistently improving the app, new for-purchase functions were added. WHIP LIVE is now the ultimate social network for outdoor sports enthusiasts, allowing to track, navigate, plan routes, explore trails and get 24/7 outdoor safety. All this, with the quality of a professional hardware, but with the connectivity and price of an App. WHIP also provides its technology and market intelligence for B2B projects with bike or moto manufacturers, brands, and event organizing committees. For instance, WHIP partners with bike and moto events that need technical solutions for increasing safety, performance tracking, or navigation. The company now headquartered in Perugia, Italy.
Industry Groups: Apps, Data and Analytics, Internet Services, Mobile, Navigation and Mapping, Software, Sports

Description: Technology and devices for real-time and on-site water analysis. Smart water monitoring
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Microx is a microtechnologies company and the proposed solution is based on the application of Lab technology on microfluidic chip. This technology allows you to miniaturize the analysis devices making them portable, reliable, low cost (90% cheaper analysis), with a minimum consumption of energy and reagents and especially fast in providing the results of analytical detection (from days to a few seconds).  The project envisages a scaling up of the technology with the aim of measuring all the pollutants present in the water. These devices are equipped with a device that can read, process and manage the data from the sensor measurement. This device can interface with all peripherals for the interpretation and transmission of the acquired data. In this way it will be possible for water network operators, water users and control bodies, monitor in real time the compatibility of the water with the intended end uses, ensuring both protection from environmental pollution and health and safety for humans. The ease of use allows anyone to perform a real-time analysis.  The ability to track and measure water quality will also significantly reduce the waste of this valuable resource.

Description: E-Commerce Business Analytics SaaS Tool
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Slymetrix Analytics is a tool that monitors in real-time the status of e-commerce traffic and sales in relation to planned objectives. It is a tool that allows every executive and operations manager to check, at a glance, the results of online sales in relation to the expected objectives for the period.  It can be installed and configured in just a few minutes without the need for any specific technical skills. Thanks to intuitive dashboards, it shows in real-time the results of visits and sales that the online shop is producing. In addition, with special indicators, you can see at a glance whether performance is good or bad. Slymetrix Analytics also offers the possibility of displaying dashboards in 16:9 so that they can be transmitted live on a TV monitor: if placed in your office, it allows you to quickly check the real-time performance throughout the day. In addition, the advanced versions allow the definition of advertising campaigns in the various digital media channels, building an inventory of channels organized by traffic providers. Once the definition is complete, for each channel of each campaign the platform generates a tracking url, through which it will be possible to monitor the performance of the campaigns and those of the digital media channels.  In conclusion, with Slymetrix Analytics every e-commerce retailer can boost its performance by optimizing its media investment by monitoring results according to budget forecasts. Why investing: Because Slymetrix is the key tool to enable e-commerce to improve its performance and thus achieve the expected economic goals (increase sales and profit by at least 30%). The e-commerce market is growing steadily and today has around 15 million online shops.  Because we have developed a 100% scalable Full SaaS business model, cloning successful international models with the intention of attracting the attention of large international groups interested in acquiring the startup (exit).  Because our goal is to achieve an exit within 3/5 years of incorporation that will allow investors in this round to get x10 return.  Market: Slymetrix is positioned in the Business Analytics Software Platforms market. The global Business Analytics Software market size was valued at $53.68 billion in 2019 and is expected to reach $120.27 billion by 2027, registering a CAGR of 10.5% from 2020 to 2027. Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence: We have laid the foundations for evolving our mathematical algorithms into Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence systems that will make decisions on behalf of platform users. The aim is for the tools themselves to suggest how to manage investments in order to improve performance.

Description: A Metaverse for sound content
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Soundsofthings is a Metaverse for sound content that is turned into non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and traded on the blockchain.   We think that sound communication is possible, not audio but sound communication, above any language and culture, inclusive by nature. The opportunity is potentially huge because in SoundsOfThings every emotion will have a sound, and every Brand will have a sound Logo. The SoundsOfThings economy is regulated by the Sound Coin, which is used for several reasons and also to buy user-generated content from users or composers.  SoundsOfThings, with its apps and portals, is live. Since the incorporation, we have developed and launched SoT in a real market environment in collaboration with Eni gas e luce (largest energy provider in Italy) and in the USA with Ferrero Nutella (third-largest chocolate producer worldwide). Description: MyTutela is a personal security app that collects and stores digital evidence that lie on the smartphone, with forensics criteria.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: MyTutela is a personal security app that collects and stores digital evidence that lie on the smartphone, with forensics criteria. MyTutela collects texts messages, phone calls register and media, stores all information on a dedicated cloud and applies to each file a unique and universal algorithm that certifies its authenticity and immutability. For any digital evidence to be valid in Judicial proceedings, the integrity of the data must be proven. Given that there is often a high risk of alteration of data stored on devices, it can be difficult to prove the chain of custody. The application serves to avoid these issues by providing somewhere to store proofs in a forensically sound manner, even when the phone is lost and damaged. It is designed to tackle the difficulties that victims of stalking, harassment, bullying and other online offenses, face in providing evidence when filing a report. The app indeed produces a report, which can be printed and attached to a Police Complaint. Thus it encourages and supports victims to report crimes or offenses. Through the analysis of the utilized jargon, the context and frequency of the phrases used in the gathered files, MyTutela AI identifies the presence of risk elements for the users and suggests them the right professional to contact (lawyer, psychologist, forensics consultant), from its own database.
Industry Groups: Information Technology, Software
Founders: Marco Calonzi, Marco Testi, Susanna Testi

Description: Marinanow is a online booking company which lets you book berths and rent boats throughout Europe via your smartphone talet or pc.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Marinanow is an online portal that allows sailors to search for places to moor their boats in marinas, compare prices between varyious marinas and book online. The current systems for booking places for private boats in marinas both in the mediterranean and worldwide is outdated and complicated.  There is no one unified system for managing bookings so owners of boats currently have to search for phone numbers of directors of the marina, overcome language and time difference and ring them up to check for and reserve places.  If that marina is full, or the director is difficult to reach, the boat owners have to search again for nearby ports. Marinanow solves this problem by using proven business models from the hotel and home rental industry.  It offers the ability to book online, automatically from any port in the world using one site (a similar concept to sites like hotels.com).  It also allows the “subleasing” of berths that have long term bookings (a similar concept to airbnb). The team is made up of four partners who have a vast experience in the marina industry as well as programming, internet companies and Startups.  They have been accepted into an incubator and raised money from an accelerator programme and are now looking for angels to coinvest with United Ventures, an Italian VC firm. The site and mobile apps are online and fully functional and last summer, the team invested a small amount in marketing to test the product.  The test was a huge success with a return of initial investment of around 2000%.   They are now looking to raise further money to build on this initial success and expand aggressively to become the dominant player.
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Community and Lifestyle, Sports, Travel and Tourism
Founders: Alessandro Sestini, Andrea Corvaglia, Paolo Codina
Top 5 Investors: United Ventures, U-Start, The Net Value, Mario Mariani

Industries: Cloud Computing, Data Center, Energy Efficiency, Software
Description: Eco4Cloud offers an innovative solution to modernize the data centers and exploit the potentialities of cloud computing.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Eco4Cloud offers an innovative solution to modernize the data centers and exploit the potentialities of Cloud Computing, in order to obtain higher efficiency, guarantees of high quality of service for the applications executed in the data centers, and significant energy savings. Eco4Cloud leverages the services offered by Virtualization platforms, such as VMware vSphere and Microsoft Hyper-V: the application are hosted by Virtual Machines, VMs, which are allocated and executed on physical machines, or servers. By consolidating the VMs on a number of servers as low as possible, it is possible to power off the remaining servers, or switch them to a low power state, in this way reducing the amount of consumed electrical energy. Moreover, the Eco4Cloud solution prevents possible overload situations, which could deteriorate the quality of service experienced by users. Finally, thanks to the automated management, it is possible to reduce the burden related to the administration and monitoring of the data center.
Industry Groups: Energy, Hardware, Information Technology, Internet Services, Software, Sustainability

Most of the existing solutions for the Internet of Things provide strictly verticalized use cases, building ecosystems basically blind to any horizontal cross-device interaction. On the other hand, Atooma team is developing different SDKs for each of the main fragmented sectors of the IoT market, such as: automotive, home automation, wearables, and mobile devices. Full Description: The goal is to create a device and software that allows people to monitor their health readings as accurate as it is possible physically and technologically. History There are many different online-programs and solutions in the world that capture indicators that have a direct or indirect bearing on the state of a human body and, therefore, provide analytical information. Unfortunately, all this information is superficial and does not replace visiting a qualified physician. In fact, we can only talk about the programs associated with the sport, but not with health diagnostics. We have set the goal to create a device and software that allow people to monitor their health readings as accurate as it is possible physically and technologically, track evidence of their health, so that later, together with the best practicing physicians, we will be able to create intelligent analytic software for early detection and identification of negative trends in a human body.

Description: Industry 4.0 plug&play. Enabling an Open ecosystem of Machines and Applications.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: INDUSTRY 4.0 IS CHANGING EVERY ASPECT OF HOW INDUSTRY OPERATES. Every process and activity can be optimized, networked, and made smarter by exploiting machines’ embedded intelligence to manage their operations, production processes, integrate information across enterprise own processes and within the extended supply chain. Alleantia provides the most scalable and cost-effective Industrial IoT solution in the market for data collection, information standardization and distribution from wire to cloud, to implement pervasive machines data access and comprehensive information sharing within the enterprise and across its extended supply chain. Alleantia software connects in few seconds any device — from complex machinery to simpler sensors — to create a complete and interoperable digital twin for each new or legacy industrial equipment, supporting a vast majority of industrial protocols and communication interfaces with a innovative, agile codeless 'driver' model  Instantly feed selected data into multiple enterprise IT applications and clouds through certified ‘IIoT Apps’, with full control from end user.  Alleantia software provides multiple ways to use machine data, from Digital Twin IIoT Apps that instantly feed machine information to IT development platforms, or publish machine data using specific communication protocols, to Alleantia IIoT Apps using machine data within embedded applications or public application platforms, to Application Ecosystem IIoT Apps with many Industry 4.0 applications “connected by Alleantia”. Dozens of Application partners, hundreds of systems and machines connected, large customers and machines manufacturers adopting our technology makes Alleantia software the reference solution for implementing an open, scalable and future-prood Industrial IoT architecture, supported by bespoken hardware vendors such as Dell, Advantech and Cisco.
Industry Groups: Energy, Internet Services, Manufacturing, Science and Engineering, Sustainability
Founders: Antonio Conati Barbaro, Marco Bicocchi Pichi, Stefano Linari
Top 5 Investors: Momenta, Guanxi, Alberto Giusti, Stefano Linari

Industries: Embedded Systems, Internet, Internet of Things, Software
Description: TomorrowData develops encrypted software with out-of-the-box cloud-based features for seamless remote control and telemetry applications.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: TomorrowData has built iottly, a software tool for Low-level Remote Control, and Telemetry application. Iottly consists of two parts: the software (agent) to be installed on the devices permanently connects to a cloud-based device maintenance platform via lightweight and robust MQTT protocol with certificate-based encryption and authentication. The agent can be installed on any embedded device running Linux: from surveillance Cameras to Connected Machines, from Biomedical Equipment to Industrial Automation Systems, from Access Control Systems to Building Management Systems.  The technician then uses the cloud web interface is so able to take full control of the device, with the traditional tools he is used to, like ssh, with no requirements for inconvenient network configurations. We also provide APIs to automate tasks like massive upgrades or generate notifications based on health checks of devices. Finally, the agent is customizable with python scripts, like macros, to add personalized remote controls.
Industry Groups: Hardware, Internet Services, Science and Engineering, Software

Advanced analytics is also provided to monitor applications’ rates and trends and assess the performance of mobile campaigns. Thanks to AppsBuilder’s cloud-based system, users can add new content and refresh layout anytime they want, then preview changes in real time. In just a few clicks, they can synchronize their website content with their app, so to offer their users a satisfying up-to-date mobile experience. In a nutshell, AppsBuilder is the ultimate solution to take your business to new heights through the most innovative mobile technologies of our times.

Description: WinMedical is a medical device company developing a modular and wearable monitoring system for Patients in low-acuity care units and home.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: WinMedical brings to the market a modular, scalable and easy to use platform to continuously monitor vital signs of the Patient in hospital and at home: WINPACK. WinPack is the leading wearable modular device for real-time, continuous and simultaneous vital signs monitoring in non-critical care units and at home, offering: Continuous Non Invasive Blood Pressure – cNIPB, 5-Lead ECG, Heart Rate, Pulse Rate, SpO2, Body Temperature, Posture, and Respiration Rate. It is comfortable to wear, easy to use and lightweight. WinPack’s sensor modules enable monitoring of vital signs via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi while customizable alert settings allow early detection of Patient deterioration. WinPack keeps Patients continuously monitored by the medical staff - anytime and anywhere, whether in hospital or at home while offering an effective cost-reduction solution to healthcare providers. WinPack is the first customizable hardware and software solution for any hospital department, and delivers an increase in efficiency and effectiveness of clinical workflows. WinPack has been proven to generate costs savings and increase clinical efficiency for hospitals through several case studies, as well as through its use in hospital departments including: General Medicine, Haematology, Infectious Diseases, Pneumatology, Nuclear Medicine, Oncology, Post Surgical, Gastroenterology and Internal Medicine. WinPack allows: ->    Better Patient care ->    Valuable cost reductions for healthcare providers ->    Significant reduction of clinical risks ->    Considerable reduction of the medical professional liability and litigation risks ->    Seamless continuum of care from hospital to home through better care coordination and clinical collaboration  By connecting doctors, Nurses and Patients, WinPack improves the quality and turnaround time of the care of adults, infants and paediatric Patients in hospital and at home whether in bed or out of bed. Doctors and Nurses may access Patient’s data at anytime using our user friendly software solution on their PCs, Notebooks, Tablets and Smartphones.
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering, Software

Description: CoRehab aims at changing the way of doing rehabilitation and exercise therapy both at the clinic and at home.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: CoRehab develops technologically advanced solutions to be alongside anyone who helps patients in their rehabilitation process or in a particular period of life.  Over 15.000 patients have successfully used the CoRehab products both in the clinic and at home regarding orthopedic, neurological, aging and sport conditions for a total of over 180.000 exercises performed. CoRehab has collaborated with more than 12 research institutes to validate the clinical and motivational effects of the use of the solutions on different conditions such as stroke, Parkinson, total joint replacement and ACL injuries, just to mention a few.  CoRehab is an ISO13485:2016 certified company that designs and manufactures CE certified class 1/m medical devices for clinic and home usage. The devices aim at measuring movements, motivating the patient and providing accurate and objective data to professionals. The CoRehab solutions are based on the use of inertial wearable sensors and proprietary softwares, developed on the basis of the most modern techniques of user experience.  The sensors measure accurately the movement performed and the patient receives an audio-visual biofeedback motivating him and stimulating autocorrection during the execution of the exercises. The data of exercises performed are automatically elaborated and available for consultation by professionals, allowing accurate remote monitoring in case the patient is performing exercises at home. Thanks to the technology used, CoRehab solutions also support professionals in the execution of objective and accurate evaluations providing results of high clinical value.
Industry Groups: Health Care, Sports

Description: WAMI is the first water with a mission born in Italy.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Our mission is to provide clean water to people in need and give to everyone the possibility to solve the problem of water in the world, by transforming an ordinary act in something extraordinary. Why water? Water is the most important resource we have, but still today 700 million people do not have access to clean water. Most of these people live in rural and isolated areas and have to walk long hours to get the water necessary for the survival of their family. Lack of drinkable water not only endangers people's health, but also takes away a lot of valuable time from women and children who usually take care of the supply. What can we do? With every WAMI bottle, you donate 100 litres of clean water. Thanks to a simple act, you help us build water projects in villages in need and change the world one bottle at a time.  Our water flows down the Italian Alps at 1600 metres above the sea level, from an oligo-mineral source known for its organoleptic properties. By choosing this brand, everyday-water-consumers have the possibility to make the change in the world in an ethical and responsible way.    In addition of giving access to drinkable water to villages in need, WAMI is also committed to sustainability. The packaging is 100% recyclable and made with 50% recycled r-PET plastic, the maximum allowed in Italy. Moreover, in order to minimize the environmental impact and to contribute to the reabsorption of CO2, the start-up plants trees in Italy in collaboration with Rete Clima.
Industry Groups: Community and Lifestyle, Consumer Goods, Food and Beverage, Health Care, Other, Real Estate

Description: BAASBOX is the first Backend as a Service (BaaS) that is open source, free to download, free to use and free to modify.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: BaasBox is a software that supports all app developers all across the globe who want to develop their apps at the fastest and most convenient rate.   The “Box” in BaasBox means that all backend features are in a standalone server, just like a… box. No Application Server, no Database Server, just a JVM and nothing more. All you have to do is download BaasBox, install it wherever you want and connect your application to the Box. You may install BaasBox on your laptop, on your server, on a PaaS provider (RedHat OpenShift, for instance) or on a IaaS provider (Amazon AWS).   Although similar to other cloud-computing developer tools, such as software as a service (SaaS), infrastructure as a service (IaaS), and platform as a service (PaaS), BaaS is distinct from these other services because it specifically addresses the cloud-computing needs of web and mobile app developers by providing a unified means of connecting their apps to cloud services.   Currently, BaasBox provides only a little subset of features, and can be used via standard HTTP REST API calls. Soon the number of functions will grow along with its development. BaasBox was built with simplicity in mind. You have nothing to install but a JVM and you are ready to go.
Industry Groups: Software
Top 5 Investors: Seeweb Srl, LUISS ENLABS, Filas, LVenture Group

Description: Unconventional Triathlon
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: The Titanium Challenge was born between 2019 and 2020. A product of ever-moving, dynamic and creative minds. From the love of sport, dedication and above all, passion, true passion, came an idea that revolutionises the classic Triathlon. Titanium consists of mixed disciplines, that are not in succession as in the classic triathlon. A cycle followed by a run, back on the bike and then another run. The Titanium Challenge includes running on (beach) sand, this discipline gives life to a new sort of unconventional triathlon.  Our Challenge is characterised by the lack of strategy as in the triathlon, because each discipline is proposed more than once, transforming the classic dynamics and stratagems. Only strength, training and the mind matters, in other words: THE POWER OF OURSELVES
Industry Groups: Professional Services, Sales and Marketing
